head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ULLMAN, SCHELLE L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ULLMAN, SCHELLE L.

block.p: ULLMAN-Schelle L. Of New York City on June 10, 2000. Beloved daughter of Sylvia. Devoted sister of Joel and Evelyn, and loving aunt to their children Carin, Steven and Randie. Funeral services Wednesday, June 14, 10:00 AM at Zion Memorial Chapel, 785 East Boston Post Road, Mamaroneck, New York, 914-381-1809.
